description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Sutton's Hospital, The Charterhouse, 15, Charterhouse Square, Islington, Islington, London, EC1M 6AX

TPO Reference
T28 - Plane of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007
T34 - Plane of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007

PO Number
TO80141

Work specifications
1 x Plane (T28) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007
Reduce back lateral spread of lowest large limb on the northern side by 20%, reducing back length of the limb over the car park area reducing the tip loading of the limb
Remove deadwood

1 x Plane (T34) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.367) 2007
Reduce back lateral length of limb identified with areas of decay on the north-western side of the crown by 50%
Crown reduce remainder of crown by a maximum of 20-25% and shape.  The aim of the work will help to encourage re-growth from the lower area of the crown, including promoting sub-lateral shoot growth on the north-western side of the Crown.
Remove deadwood

Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: The authority strongly recommends that some new pre-emptive replacement trees are planted in Charterhouse Square to account for the condition of some of the protected trees.  This recommendation is in line with good arboricultural management of the tree population and canopy cover in this historic setting.
